text: Xia Chuzhong (; 30 May 1904 – 28 December 1988) was a KMT general from Yiyang, Hunan province. He participated in many battles during the Second Sino- Japanese War, including the Battle of Shanghai. He died in Taipei, Taiwan in 1988. ==References== Category:National Revolutionary Army generals from Hunan Category:People from Yiyang Category:1904 births Category:1988 deaths
title: Xia Chuzhong
